      • getCoupon

        @GET
 @Path(value="/get/coupon/{id}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCoupon(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                   long id)
                                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the desired coupon in the database
        Returns:
        a response with a status code and the correct response according to the outcome of the method - either a coupon object in json format, or the reason why the method could not get that coupon from the database.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getAllCoupons

        @GET
 @Path(value="/get/all/coupons")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllCoupons()
                                                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Returns:
        a response with a status code and the correct response according to the outcome of the method - either an array of all of the coupons in the database in json format, or the reason why the method could not get the coupons from the database.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • purchaseCoupon

        @POST
 @Path(value="/purchase/coupon")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response purchaseCoupon(core.Coupon coupon)
        Parameters:
        coupon - a coupon object sent from the client.
        Returns:
        a response with a status code and the correct response according to the outcome of the method - either a message that the coupon was purchased, or the reason why the method could not purchase the coupons.

      • getAllPurchasedCoupons

        @GET
 @Path(value="/get/all/purchased/coupons")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllPurchasedCoupons()
                                                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Returns:
        a response with a status code and the correct response according to the outcome of the method - either an array of all of the customer's purchased coupons in the database in json format, or the reason why the method could not get the coupons from the database.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getAllPurchasedCouponsByType

        @GET
 @Path(value="/get/all/purchased/coupons/type/{couponType}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllPurchasedCouponsByType(@PathParam(value="couponType")
                                                                                                                                  core.CouponType couponType)
                                                                                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        couponType - the couponType of the desired purchased coupons in the database
        Returns:
        a response with a status code and the correct response according to the outcome of the method - either an array of all of the customer's purchased coupons in the database of the given couponType in json format or, the reason why the method could not get the coupons from the database.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice

        @GET
 @Path(value="/get/all/purchased/coupons/price/{price}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice(@PathParam(value="price")
                                                                                                                               double price)
                                                                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        price - the max price of the desired purchased coupons in the database
        Returns:
        a response with a status code and the correct response according to the outcome of the method - either an array of all of the customer's purchased coupons in the database with a price up to the given price in json format, or the reason why the method could not get the coupons from the database.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
